translations.name: New Testament in Abua
translations.description: The first New Testament in Abuan, translated by Ian Gardner, has been archived. We've yet to find live links to this Bible online. The Bible has a translated introduction, chapter and section headings, inter-Gospel references, references, illustrations, glossary, and maps.
